summary: A gifted teenager dreaming of life beyond her small town becomes inspired when a 15-year-old girl from New York moves in next door.
cast: Liane Balaban|Tara Spencer-Nairn|Mary Walsh|Nicholas Campbell|Cathy Moriarty|Andrew McCarthy|Darren Keay|Kevin Curran|Krista MacDonald|Cassie MacDonald|Adrien Dixon|Patrick Joyce|Lorne Pardy|Mark McKinney|Susan Quinn|Stacy Smith|Zach Fraser|Jody Richardson|Dave Frances|Patricia Zentilli|Sarah Whittier|Mike MacPhee|Lori LeDrew|Ida Donovan|Rudy Pilchie|John Dunsworth|Gordon Patrick White|Maynard Morrison|Gordon Gammie|Marguerite McNeil|Tricia Fish|John Goodrich|Stephen Gillis|Laurel MacDonald|Colleen MacIsaac|Bette MacDonald|Sarah Loveridge|Aaron Armstrong|Blair Boone|Ashley MacIsaac|Sam White|Dugald McLaren|Taylor Steele
title: New Waterford Girl
